      • size

        public HCanvas size(float w,
                    float h)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Sets the size of this drawable. If this drawable is set to resize proportionally, the new width will be adjusted according to the new height by default. (The exception to this is if the new height is the same as the old height, then the new height will be adjusted according to the new width instead.)
        Overrides:
        size in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        w - The new width for this drawable.
        h - The new height for this drawable.
        Returns:
        This drawable.
        See Also:
        HDrawable.size(float), HDrawable.width(float), HDrawable.height(float)

      • width

        public HCanvas width(float w)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Sets the width of this drawable. If this drawable is set to resize proportionally, the height will also change accordingly via onResize(float,float,float,float).
        Overrides:
        width in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        w - The new width for this drawable
        Returns:
        This drawable.
        See Also:
        HDrawable.size(float,float), HDrawable.size(float), HDrawable.height(float)

      • height

        public HCanvas height(float h)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Sets the height of this drawable. If this drawable is set to resize proportionally, the width will also change accordingly.
        Overrides:
        height in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        h - The new height for this drawable
        Returns:
        This drawable.
        See Also:
        HDrawable.size(float,float), HDrawable.size(float), HDrawable.width(float)

      • paintAll

        public void paintAll(processing.core.PGraphics g,
                     boolean zFlag,
                     float alphaPc)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Prepares the environment for drawing this drawable and its children. This method is primarily called internally during the draw cycle and probably wouldn't need to be called directly.
        Overrides:
        paintAll in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context for this drawable.
        zFlag - Indicates if z-coordinates are used.
        alphaPc - The current alpha value in the draw cycle.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PGraphics g,
                 boolean b,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 float f)
        Description copied from class: HDrawable
        Draws this drawable. This method is abstract and is meant to be implemented by the children of this class. Also, this method is primarily called internally during the draw cycle and probably wouldn't need to be called directly.
        Specified by:
        draw in class HDrawable
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context for this drawable.
        b - Indicates if z-coordinates are used.
        x - The x coordinate where this drawable would consider as 0
        y - The y coordinate where this drawable would consider as 0
        f - The current alpha value in the draw cycle.
